But, it doesn't seem to work for `JSServe.Button`s... Maybe there is something special about `Button`?
With something like:
```buttons = [JSServe.Button(string(i)) for i in 1:9]
class = "grid grid-cols-3 gap-4"
DOM.div(buttons..., class = class)```
I get one row instead of 3 columns (with 3 rows)...
